articles.author: Corky Siemaszko
articles.title: U2 releases Renee Good tribute song 'American Obituary' - NBC News
articles.description: Irish rockers U2 condemn ICE immigration raids with the surprise release of EP "Days of Ash," featuring a song for slain Minneapolis protester Renée Good, "American Obituary."
articles.content: Irish rockers U2 became the latest high-powered musical act to condemn the federal immigration raids with the surprise release Wednesday of a six-track EP that kicks off with a song for slain Minneap… [+2752 chars]
